senses.sense_definition: A female given name of Sanskrit origin, mainly used in India.

examples.text: My colleague <w>Sita</w> brought some traditional sweets to the office party.
They decided to name their daughter <w>Sita</w> to honor her grandmother.

senses.sense_definition: A goddess in Hindu mythology, the consort of Rama.

examples.text: The ancient epic describes the devotion and trials of <w>Sita</w>.
Many paintings in the temple depict the wedding of Rama and <w>Sita</w>.
